scripts.setup-keys: pnpm snarkjs groth16 setup build/token_ownership.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_14.ptau build/circuit_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute-1: openssl rand -hex 32 | pnpm snarkjs zkey contribute build/circuit_0000.zkey build/circuit_0001.zkey --name='Contributor_1'
scripts.contribute-2: openssl rand -hex 32 | pnpm snarkjs zkey contribute build/circuit_0001.zkey build/circuit_final.zkey --name='Contributor_2'
scripts.contribute-all: pnpm run contribute-1 && pnpm run contribute-2
scripts.export-vkey: pnpm snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/circuit_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && pnpm run download-ptau && pnpm run compile && pnpm run setup-keys && pnpm run contribute-all && pnpm run export-vkey
scripts.verify: pnpm snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json public.json proof.json
